Course Calendar Subscriptions
CSE 455 25wi
Many calendaring systems allow you to subscribe to remote calendars (e.g., Google (how?), iCal (how?), etc.). Here are the URIs of calendars available for this course. Course events have been partitioned into a number of distinct calendars, so you can subcribe to just the ones that interest you. (Cut-and-paste the URI into your calendar provider, following their procedure for subscribing to foreign calendars.)

(Exams and homeworks appear in the lecture calendar(s).)

DescriptionCalendar URI
Lecture A
TTh 10:00-11:20		http://courses.cs.washington.edu/courses/cse455/25wi/calendar/calendar-lecture-A.ics
